component.name: AnimationFloatExample
component.script:
sub init() examplerect = m.top.boundingRect() centerx = (1280 - examplerect.width) / 2 centery = (720 - examplerect.height) / 2 m.top.translation = [ centerx, centery ]
m.floatanimation = m.top.FindNode("exampleFloatAnimation") m.floatanimation.repeat = true m.floatanimation.control = "start" end sub
